subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*(g/k)wa-n||to put on; to wear; to clothe}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|བགོ||to put on; to wear; clothing}}, {{m|bo|གོས||clothes; garments; dress}}, {{m|bo|གོན}}, {{m|bo|གྱོན||to put on; to wear}}, {{m|bo|སྐོན||to dress; to clothe}}.
